items.sentence: I\'m afraid that I won\'t finish the report on time.
I\'m sure that Tom didn\'t mean to be disrespectful.
Tom never told me he wanted to go to Boston with us.
You should tell Tom that you don\'t want to do that.
Are you going to be ready by the time Tom gets here?
Are you positive that you saw me turn off the stove?
With his support, she might have been elected mayor.
Would you like a window seat or a seat on the aisle?
All of my classmates are better at French than I am.
We\'re not going to give Tom the money he asked for.
